name: Cartwright
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Cartwright and have them choose another player, then if there are any drunk or poisoned players between themselves and the chosen player, indicate a yes. Otherwise, indicate a no.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Cartwright and have them choose another player, then if there are any drunk or poisoned players between themselves and the chosen player, indicate a yes. Otherwise, indicate a no.
ability: Each night, choose an alive player (not yourself); you learn if there are any drunk or poisoned players between you on a shortest route.
